definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: The born weakness of vernacular poems is the unrefined language.
sentences.chinese: 白話詩語言欠精練，是與生俱來之病。

sentences.english: There are special rigin and environment of the Free Poetry and Free Verse Revolution in China.
sentences.chinese: 白話詩和新詩革命具有特殊的生成語境。

sentences.english: Does she still write new-style poetry?
